title: Credential rotation
test_description: Validate credential rotation by testing with an expired token
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const tokenStep = stepResults.test_invalid_token; if (!tokenStep) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-102-2', title: 'Credential rotation' }; } const statusCode = tokenStep.status; if (statusCode === 401 || statusCode === 403) { return { status: 'pass', message: 'Credential rotation validated - expired token correctly rejected with ' + statusCode, code: 'TOKEN_VALIDATION_WORKING', test_id: 'IQ-102-2', title: 'Credential rotation' }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Credential validation failed - expired token accepted with status ' + statusCode, code: 'TOKEN_VALIDATION_FAILURE', test_id: 'IQ-102-2', title: 'Credential rotation' }; } }
